Package drcl.comp.contract

Class Summary
ComponentMessage The base class of component messages.
DebugContract Defines the format of the debug message exported by a component and provides utility methods to retrieve individual fields in such a message.
DebugContract.Message  
DoubleEventContract Defines the format of the dobule event message exported by a component and provides utility methods to retrieve individual fields in such a message.
DoubleEventContract.Message  
ErrorContract Defines the format of the error message exported by a component and provides utility methods to retrieve individual fields in such a message.
ErrorContract.Message  
EventContract Defines the format of the event message exported by a component and provides utility methods to retrieve individual fields in such a message.
EventContract.Message  
GarbageContract Defines the format of the garbage message exported by a component and provides utility methods to retrieve individual fields in such a message.
GarbageContract.Message  
PropertyContract Defines the format of the property message exported by a component and provides utility methods to retrieve individual fields in such a message.
PropertyContract.Message  
TraceContract Defines the format of the trace message exported by a component and provides utility methods to retrieve individual fields in such a message.
TraceContract.Message
